name: Stopover At Planet Five
description:
Explore a small world

Find your way on a small planet after a crash landing. Open up the world and collect energy to recharge your space traversal vehicle.

~ 10 minutes of play time.

Made by Joeri Ridder for the 2021 Secret Santa Gamejam.

Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Space - Jump

Left Mouse Button - Interact

Right Mouse Button - Alternative Interact
